Articles.Content:
Well everyone, Ive had the Boulder Co cloud folder in my game folder since 1.0.4 and took it out because it was being buggy. Now its 1.0.5 I thought I would try it again and it still has the issue (no surprise). So I finally felt like asking all you fine Kerbalnaughts out there how to fix this;

Whats happening is the clouds and/or atmosphere has small white flashing spots all over. (Unfortunately they are too similar to the clouds that pictures wont help.)

Never mind everyone, I fixed it

If anyone else is having this issue its because you need to go into your GameData/ActiveTextureManagement/ActiveTextureManagementConfigs and remove the BoulderCo.cfg
